title: Crust Leather
description: Our crust leather is available in various tanning processes.

types.name: Full Chrome
types.detail: Offers excellent dye uptake and softness, ideal for fashion accessories.

types.name: Semi-Chrome
types.detail: Balances durability and softness, suitable for a wide range of applications.

types.name: Full Vegetable
types.detail: Tanned using natural tannins, providing a rich patina over time.

types.name: Chrome-Free
types.detail: Environmentally friendly option, free from harmful chemicals.

title: Finished Leather
description: Our finished leather comes in a variety of textures and appearances.

types.name: Polished
types.detail: Smooth and glossy finish for a sleek look.

types.name: Burnished
types.detail: Edges are smoothed and sealed, enhancing durability.

types.name: Pigmented
types.detail: Uniform color with a protective coating.

types.name: Aniline
types.detail: Transparent finish that showcases the natural grain.

types.name: Semi-Aniline
types.detail: A blend of aniline and pigmented finishes, offering a balance between natural appearance and durability.

types.name: Nubuck
types.detail: Soft, velvety surface achieved by sanding the grain side.

title: Suede Leather
description: Available in the wet blue stage, our split leather is suitable for:

types.name: Upholstery
types.detail: Durable and comfortable for furniture applications.

types.name: Industrial Uses
types.detail: Robust material for various industrial products.

title: Lining and Upper Leather
description: Tailored for specific applications in footwear and accessories, our lining and upper leather offer:

types.name: Durability
types.detail: Withstands the rigors of daily use.

types.name: Aesthetic Appeal
types.detail: Complements the overall design of the product.
